text:
Join template: join_prescriptions_patients
Purpose: Link prescriptions to patient demographics for stratified analysis
Use case: Compare medication patterns by sex or age group
SQL: SELECT a.SUBJECT_ID, b.SUBJECT_ID FROM PRESCRIPTIONS a JOIN PATIENTS b ON a.SUBJECT_ID = b.SUBJECT_ID WHERE a.SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_prescriptions_patients
metadata.purpose: Link prescriptions to patient demographics for stratified analysis
metadata.use_case: Compare medication patterns by sex or age group

text:
Join template: join_diagnoses_icd_d_icd_diagnoses
Purpose: Map ICD diagnosis codes to the diagnosis dictionary for semantic interpretation
Use case: Frequency analysis by diagnosis name
SQL: SELECT a.ICD_CODE, b.ICD_CODE FROM DIAGNOSES_ICD a JOIN D_ICD_DIAGNOSES b ON a.ICD_CODE = b.ICD_CODE WHERE a.ICD_CODE IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_diagnoses_icd_d_icd_diagnoses
metadata.purpose: Map ICD diagnosis codes to the diagnosis dictionary for semantic interpretation

chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Use case: Compare lab distributions by age/sex groups
SQL: SELECT a.SUBJECT_ID, b.SUBJECT_ID FROM LABEVENTS a JOIN PATIENTS b ON a.SUBJECT_ID = b.SUBJECT_ID WHERE a.SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

text:
Join template: join_procedures_icd_patients
Purpose: Link procedures to patient demographics
Use case: Compare procedure frequency across patient cohorts
SQL: SELECT a.SUBJECT_ID, b.SUBJECT_ID FROM PROCEDURES_ICD a JOIN PATIENTS b ON a.SUBJECT_ID = b.SUBJECT_ID WHERE a.SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_procedures_icd_patients
metadata.purpose: Link procedures to patient demographics
metadata.use_case: Compare procedure frequency across patient cohorts

text:
Join template: join_chartevents_patients
Purpose: Link charted events to patient demographics
Use case: Compare vitals/measurements across patient cohorts
SQL: SELECT a.SUBJECT_ID, b.SUBJECT_ID FROM CHARTEVENTS a JOIN PATIENTS b ON a.SUBJECT_ID = b.SUBJECT_ID WHERE a.SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_chartevents_patients
metadata.purpose: Link charted events to patient demographics

text:
Join template: join_labevents_labitems
Purpose: Map LABEVENTS ITEMID to human-readable lab test labels
Use case: Visualize frequency or distributions by lab test name
SQL: SELECT l.ITEMID, d.LABEL FROM LABEVENTS l JOIN D_LABITEMS d ON l.ITEMID = d.ITEMID WHERE l.ITEMID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_labevents_labitems
metadata.purpose: Map LABEVENTS ITEMID to human-readable lab test labels
metadata.use_case: Visualize frequency or distributions by lab test name

text:
Join template: join_chartevents_items
Purpose: Map CHARTEVENTS ITEMID to human-readable item labels
Use case: Analyze measurement trends by chart item
SQL: SELECT c.ITEMID, d.LABEL FROM CHARTEVENTS c JOIN D_ITEMS d ON c.ITEMID = d.ITEMID WHERE c.ITEMID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_chartevents_items
metadata.purpose: Map CHARTEVENTS ITEMID to human-readable item labels
metadata.use_case: Analyze measurement trends by chart item

text:
Join template: join_diagnoses_icd_titles
Purpose: Map ICD diagnosis codes to diagnosis titles
Use case: Frequency analysis by diagnosis name
SQL: SELECT dx.ICD_CODE, d.LONG_TITLE FROM DIAGNOSES_ICD dx JOIN D_ICD_DIAGNOSES d ON dx.ICD_CODE = d.ICD_CODE AND dx.ICD_VERSION = d.ICD_VERSION WHERE dx.ICD_CODE IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_diagnoses_icd_titles
metadata.purpose: Map ICD diagnosis codes to diagnosis titles

text:
Join template: join_procedures_icd_titles
Purpose: Map ICD procedure codes to procedure titles
Use case: Frequency analysis by procedure name
SQL: SELECT pr.ICD_CODE, d.LONG_TITLE FROM PROCEDURES_ICD pr JOIN D_ICD_PROCEDURES d ON pr.ICD_CODE = d.ICD_CODE AND pr.ICD_VERSION = d.ICD_VERSION WHERE pr.ICD_CODE IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_procedures_icd_titles
metadata.purpose: Map ICD procedure codes to procedure titles

text:
Join template: join_emar_emar_detail
Purpose: Combine medication administration records with dose details
Use case: Analyze dosage and administration patterns
SQL: SELECT e.SUBJECT_ID, d.EMAR_ID FROM EMAR e JOIN EMAR_DETAIL d ON e.SUBJECT_ID = d.SUBJECT_ID AND e.EMAR_ID = d.EMAR_ID AND e.EMAR_SEQ = d.EMAR_SEQ WHERE e.SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_emar_emar_detail
metadata.purpose: Combine medication administration records with dose details

text:
Join template: join_inputevents_icustays
Purpose: Link ICU inputs to ICU stay context
Use case: Trend inputs after ICU admission
SQL: SELECT i.STAY_ID, s.STAY_ID FROM INPUTEVENTS i JOIN ICUSTAYS s ON i.STAY_ID = s.STAY_ID WHERE i.STAY_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_inputevents_icustays
metadata.purpose: Link ICU inputs to ICU stay context

text:
Join template: join_outputevents_icustays
Purpose: Link ICU outputs to ICU stay context
Use case: Trend outputs after ICU admission
SQL: SELECT o.STAY_ID, s.STAY_ID FROM OUTPUTEVENTS o JOIN ICUSTAYS s ON o.STAY_ID = s.STAY_ID WHERE o.STAY_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_outputevents_icustays
metadata.purpose: Link ICU outputs to ICU stay context

text:
Join template: join_admissions_patients
Purpose: Link admissions to patient demographics
Use case: Admission distributions by sex/age/insurance
SQL: SELECT a.SUBJECT_ID, p.GENDER FROM ADMISSIONS a JOIN PATIENTS p ON a.SUBJECT_ID = p.SUBJECT_ID WHERE a.SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_admissions_patients
metadata.purpose: Link admissions to patient demographics

text:
Join template: join_icustays_admissions
Purpose: Connect ICU stays to the hospital admission context
Use case: Compare ICU stay characteristics within admissions
SQL: SELECT i.STAY_ID, a.HADM_ID FROM ICUSTAYS i JOIN ADMISSIONS a ON i.HADM_ID = a.HADM_ID WHERE i.HADM_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_icustays_admissions
metadata.purpose: Connect ICU stays to the hospital admission context
metadata.use_case: Compare ICU stay characteristics within admissions

text:
Join template: join_transfers_admissions
Purpose: Link transfer events to admission timeline
Use case: Analyze intra-hospital movement patterns
SQL: SELECT t.HADM_ID, a.ADMITTIME FROM TRANSFERS t JOIN ADMISSIONS a ON t.HADM_ID = a.HADM_ID WHERE t.HADM_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_transfers_admissions
metadata.purpose: Link transfer events to admission timeline

text:
Join template: join_services_admissions
Purpose: Link service changes to admission timeline
Use case: Analyze service transition patterns during admission
SQL: SELECT s.HADM_ID, a.ADMITTIME FROM SERVICES s JOIN ADMISSIONS a ON s.HADM_ID = a.HADM_ID WHERE s.HADM_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_services_admissions
metadata.purpose: Link service changes to admission timeline
metadata.use_case: Analyze service transition patterns during admission

text:
Join template: join_chartevents_icustays
Purpose: Align charted events to ICU admission time
Use case: ICU post-admission trend analysis and elapsed-time views
SQL: SELECT c.STAY_ID, i.STAY_ID FROM CHARTEVENTS c JOIN ICUSTAYS i ON c.STAY_ID = i.STAY_ID WHERE c.STAY_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

metadata.name: join_chartevents_icustays
metadata.purpose: Align charted events to ICU admission time
metadata.use_case: ICU post-admission trend analysis and elapsed-time views
